events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their vehicle on Main Street during rush hour, resulting in visible damage to the front bumper and slight airbag deployment.
Claim was reviewed and categorised as an Auto Accident based on the keywords and damages described in the initial report.
An experienced claims agent specializing in auto accident cases was assigned to handle this file promptly to ensure quick resolution.
We formally acknowledged receipt of the claim and reassured the customer that their case will be handled with priority and care.
Requested copies of the police report, vehicle photographs, and medical bills associated with the accident to proceed with investigation.
Customer submitted all required documents including police report, repair estimates, and witness statements as requested.
Investigation commenced focusing on the accident circumstances, damages sustained, and liability assessment based on submitted evidence.
Investigation concluded confirming the extent of vehicle damage, fault determination, and validation of repair costs outlined in documents.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering vehicle repairs and related expenses as validated by the completed investigation.
Customer responded positively to the settlement offer and expressed appreciation for the transparency and timely communication.
The claim was officially approved following acceptance of the settlement terms by the insured party without any further dispute.
The payment for the approved settlement amount was issued to the customerâ€™s account to cover vehicle repairs and associated costs.
The claim case was officially closed after confirming receipt of payment and customer satisfaction with the resolution.
